Description: EPIPHONE ED RIVIERA Custom P93 Electric Guitar with Hard Case Condition:Used Cosmetically very well taken care of! Reserve a place in the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame with the Epiphone Riviera Custom P93 Electric Guitar. Modeled after one of Epiphone's most durable guitars, this instrument features a body made of maple and a neck made from mahogany, ensuring its to be by your side for years to come. The SlimTaper D-profile neck makes this guitar easy to handle. The ES-style body shape contributes to the production of quality sound. It also features three pickups that include three individual controls and one master control. The Epiphone Riviera, with a fretboard made of rosewood with a pearloid parallelogram overlay, is a beautiful semi-hollow guitar that produces an adaptable range of tones.
